findings.message: `Intended Outcome Statement` says "Staff can close the dayâ€¦", but this screen is management-gated (`EodChecklistContent` checks `canAccess(user, Permissions.MANAGEMENT_ACCESS)`), so the outcome statement is role-inaccurate and should be phrased for management users.
`Why` remains `TBD` while the doc is `Status: Ready-for-planning`; this leaves the outcome contract incomplete and weakens traceability for planning/audit.
